bodyV2.markdown:
In the instance where you have not received an email confirmation of your booking, please follow the below steps.Â 

  • Check your spam or junk folder.
  • Check the email address provided on the booking order.
  • Be patient - it can take up to 48 hours for an email confirmation to arrive.

If you are still unable to retrieve your email confirmation please "Submit a request".

content.name: What should I do if I haven't received my email confirmation?
